page.title: 09Tipton People
page.content: From a survey we have carried out, we found that most people have lived in Tipton all their lives and many would not think of moving. We are a closely-knit community and many of the people living here are proud to say they come from Tipton. We have a distinctive Black Country accent which is easily recognised wherever we go. Although there are some bad things about living in an urban area like Tipton, such as litter, pollution from the factories, busy roads and dangers from railways and canals, there are some advantages as well. We like to think our neighbours are friendly people,and living in this area means things like shops,schools and some jobs are handy.We also have good bs and rail services and are close to the motrway network and green belt.
